title: Florida Sheriff's Office may be sued over deputy's inaction
text:
Florida Sheriff's Office may be sued over deputy's inaction Monday, February 26, 2018 - 02:36 
The Sheriff’s Office in Broward County, Florida, could be sued over the failure of one of its deputies to enter a high school while a gunman was killing 17 people earlier this month, legal experts said. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The Sheriff’s Office in Broward County, Florida, could be sued over the failure of one of its deputies to enter a high school while a gunman was killing 17 people earlier this month, legal experts said.
